# Read GLODAPv2 2020 with relevant variables

```{r read_GLODAP_csv}

# set path to GLODAP files
path_GLODAP <- "/net/kryo/work/updata/glodapv2_2020/"

# read list of all files
file_list <- list.files(path = path_GLODAP, pattern = "*_File.csv")
print(file_list)

# select item out of file_list
file <- file_list[1]

# read in GLODAP data
GLODAP <-
  read_csv(paste(
    path_GLODAP,
    file,
    sep = ""
    ),
    na = "-9999",
    col_types = cols(.default = col_double())
  )

# select relevant columns
GLODAP <- GLODAP %>%
  select(cruise:talkqc)

# create date column
GLODAP <- GLODAP %>%
  mutate(date = ymd(paste(year, month, day))) %>%
  relocate(date) %>%
  arrange(date)

# harmonize column names
GLODAP <- GLODAP  %>%
  rename(sal = salinity,
         tem = temperature)

# harmonize coordinates
GLODAP <- GLODAP  %>%
  rename(lon = longitude,
         lat = latitude) %>%
  mutate(lon = if_else(lon < 20, lon + 360, lon))

# remove irrelevant columns
GLODAP <- GLODAP %>%
  select(-c(cruise:cast, day:minute, bottomdepth, pressure, theta, aou, aouf, 
            maxsampdepth, bottle, sigma0:sigma4,
            nitrite:nitritef))

# select relevant years and filter tco2 NaN
GLODAP <- GLODAP %>%
  filter(year >= 1982) %>%
  filter(!is.na(tco2))

# regrid to 1*1 intervals
GLODAP <- GLODAP %>% 
  mutate(lat = cut(lat, seq(-90, 90, 1), seq(-89.5, 89.5, 1)),
         lat = as.numeric(as.character(lat)),
         lon = cut(lon, seq(20, 380, 1), seq(20.5, 379.5, 1)),
         lon = as.numeric(as.character(lon)))

# write file
GLODAP %>%
  write_csv(here::here("data",
                       "GLODAPv2.2020_Merged_clean.csv"))

```
